newsitem.title: GERMANY: Bundesbank sets 14-day repo tender at fixed 3 pct.
newsitem.headline: Bundesbank sets 14-day repo tender at fixed 3 pct.

text.p: The Bundesbank said on Tuesday it was setting a tender for 14-day securities repurchase agreements, offering banks liquidity at a fixed rate of three percent.
Funds will be credited to accounts tomorrow and the securities have to be repurchased on November 6.
A 69.9 billion-mark facility set at a fixed three percent interest rate expires on Wednesday.
A 14-day facility set last week carried interest rates of three percent.
